name: Perils in the Dark
desc: The strange crystal plummeted toward the ground and shattered it, revealing an entrance to even greater depths. Who knows what's down there... But either way, it would be best to proceed with caution.

customize.text:
<color=#ece5d8>The Chasm: Underground Mines, Liyue</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Description:</color> <color=#ffffff>The strange crystal plummeted toward the ground and shattered it, revealing an entrance to even greater depths. Who knows what's down there... But either way, it would be best to proceed with caution.</color>
Quest Objective: Take the path that leads deeper in
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> The road ahead seems covered in a dark fog. Did something happen over there?
Quest Objective: Examine the dark fog in front of you
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Ack! It's almost like this thing is rejecting us! We can't get through!
Quest Objective: Look for clues near the dark fog
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Huh. Who left this bag behind? Maybe we can get some useful info from its contents!
Quest Objective: Read the logs
<color=#ffffff>Fatuus' Journal:</color> ...Staff Sergeant Anton has discovered a large bell to the southeast. The rock walls have their" script all over it..."
<color=#ffffff>Fatuus' Journal:</color> ...This is very similar to the large bell that the Captain discovered in the ruins to the northwest. Perhaps...
<color=#ffffff>Fatuus' Journal:</color> ...We dispatched Snezhevna and Fadeyka to ring the two bells in their respective corners...
<color=#ffffff>Fatuus' Journal:</color> ...As the terrifying tolls reverberated through the stone, the black fog dissipated. What a strange phenomenon... it's almost like the bells were announcing someone's arrival...
<color=#ffffff>Fatuus' Journal:</color> ...Ten were lost, two vanguard squads took immense damage. The Captain ordered a retreat...
<color=#ffffff>Fatuus' Journal:</color> (A simple map falls out from the diary. The map marks out the two bells in the northwest and the southeast, with two ominous skulls to go with them.)
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> These two places look like real bad news, but we've got to go to 'em if we wanna know what's going on.
<color=#ffffff>Quest Description:</color> <color=#ffffff>You enter the depths of the Chasm after opening the way, but your progress is barred by a purple-black fog. It seems that you must ring bells within the ruins to disperse this fog...</color>
Quest Objective: Ring the two bells on either side of the ruins
Go to the northwestern bell
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> This is the place... Whoa! The bell has been covered in the dark mud...
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Will tolling this bell really cause the black fog to disperse?
Ring the northwestern bell
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Whoa! That sound is ultra spooky! Let's get outta here!
Go to the southeastern bell
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> The bell marked on the map should be around here... Let's take out the monsters first!
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Let's ring it and get going, shall we? Who knows what'll happen once we do...
Quest Objective: Approach the dark fog
<color=#ffffff>Egill:</color> Who art thou?
<color=#ffffff>Agnarr:</color> This ground is not to be trespassed. Why have ye come, sinners?
Quest Objective: Defeat the Abyss Lector
<color=#ffffff>Egill:</color> ...The light of... heaven...
<color=#ffffff>Agnarr:</color> ...The lies... All gone...
Quest Objective: Pick up the object that the Abyss Lector left behind
Obtain

customize.name: The Heavenly Stone's Debris
customize.desc: To get to ever-deeper levels of The Chasm, you must open the path that was blocked by large stones back when the mine was sealed. Looks like you'll have to borrow the power of the Mountainator this time...

customize.name: The Chasm Delvers
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following Zhiqiong, an aspiring adventurer, to investigate The Chasm: Underground Mines.

customize.name: The Chasm Charters
customize.desc:
Accept the commission from Lan
Lan of the Adventurers' Guild has offered you a commission to explore The Chasm, which you have accepted. First, you'll need to find the representative of the Ministry of Civil Affairs, Muning, who has been stationed there.

Accept the commission from Xu
You accept Xu's commission to deliver the Mora Xingqiu has lent out to the Ministry of Civil Affairs' specialist, Muning, at The Chasm.

customize.name: Surreptitious Seven-Star Seal Sundering
customize.desc: You have accepted a commission that requires you to pay The Chasm a visit. Who knows what the situation in the long-sealed mines might be like...

customize.name: Chasm Spelunkers
customize.desc: Now that you have destroyed the Bedrock Keys, the seal on The Chasm has now come undone. It is time to venture into the depths below.

customize.name: First Miasmic Contact
customize.desc: Investigate the mysterious environs beneath the stone and take pictures related to the black mud.

customize.name: Meeting New People... and Foiling Some Bandits

customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.
